properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 6:57AM EST until January 23 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level
expected in low-lying areas bordering the banks of the Lower
Cape Fear River.

* WHERE...Along the banks of the Lower Cape Fear River from
Wilmington southward.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...The lowest parts of USS North Carolina Road and low
spots of Battleship Road begin to flood. Water begins to spread
out of the storm drains onto Water Street of downtown
Wilmington. Water will partially cover River Road south of
downtown Wilmington.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING
